description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 11/18/2005

Eric is firm when he tells Brooke he wants to completely commit to their marriage therefore she runs to Nick for advice.  Nick tells Brooke that she needs to end things with Eric. Dante confides in Stephanie about his fears that Bridget is falling for Nick again. Stephanie and Dante present Bridget with divorce papers, but Bridget is hesitant to sign them. Nick then enters and tries to convince Bridget not to sign the papers, while Stephanie and Dante keep encouraging her to divorce Nick.
